topic.title: Standard DITA XML
topic.shortdesc: DITA Open Toolkit supports all released versions of the OASIS DITA specification, including 1.0, 1.1, 1.2, and 1.3. As of release , DITA-OT also provides an initial preview of features for the latest draft of the upcoming DITA 2.0 standard.

body.p: The DITA specification “defines a set of document types for authoring and organizing topic-oriented information, as well as a set of mechanisms for combining, extending, and constraining document types.” The is the authoritative source of information on authoring DITA content in XML.
